document.description: The staff was friendly and the restaurant itself was clean and the atmosphere was ... but she is always excited to eat at the Panda because they have a large selection. ...

Contributor I love the Oriental Wok..we live in Alexandria sometimes (we travel with my husbands work) we like to eat out alot so we have tryed chinese in about ... More

Contributor We visited the restaurant today my husband and I along with our kids and the food was excellent. Everyone was very satisfied with the food as well as ... More

Contributor This is my favorite resturant..they staff is awesome the food is delicious..the prices are great you get alot of food for your money...i got here ... More
Map Details Add to Trip Reviews (11) 8. Spirits Food&Friends Alexandria, LA AVERAGE USER RATING (8) A Yahoo! Contributor I've been eating there for years.. I always have had good meals from hamburgers to the grilled chicken salad.. Very good service.
Map Details Add to Trip Reviews (8) 9. Sake Sushi Japanese Restaurant Alexandria, LA Cuisine: Japanese AVERAGE USER RATING (7) A Yahoo! Contributor Excellent sushi! I have been to this restaurant many times and have always had a great dining experience. The sushi is always delicious.
Map Details Add to Trip Reviews (7) 10. Bellino's Alexandria, LA Cuisine: Italian AVERAGE USER RATING (18) A Yahoo! Contributor Honestly by far the worst dining experience I have ever had. The staff was friendly and the restaurant itself was clean and the atmosphere was great. ... More

Contributor I have stopped in Lafayette and found Checkers before it came to Alexandria and was thrilled to have one buile locally now Put one in Pineville..All ... More
Map Details Add to Trip Reviews (1) 14. Chinese Kitchen Alexandria, LA Cuisine: Chinese AVERAGE USER RATING (2) A Yahoo! Contributor The buffets in this town taste all the same....uggh. Chinese Kitchen is a little hole in the wall but the food is the best. It is made to order and ... More
Map Details Add to Trip Reviews (2) 15. Suburban Garden Alexandria, LA Cuisine: Italian AVERAGE USER RATING (6) A Yahoo! Contributor I happened to drive by this place and thought it looked like one of those quaint old places that only the locals know. I walked in and was told to sit ... More
Map Details Add to Trip Reviews (6) 16. Road House Family Diner Alexandria, LA AVERAGE USER RATING (2) A Yahoo! Contributor My name is Brandy ive been a waitress at Pitt Grill of and on since 2005just recently went back a month ago.It is a very good place to relax and drink ... More

Map Details Add to Trip Reviews (1) 19. Raising Cane's Alexandria, LA AVERAGE USER RATING (3) A Yahoo! Contributor The chicken tenders are ok. The fries are frozen crinkle cut fries. No biggie. The sauce......seems like mayo ketchup and worcestershire sauce and ... More

Contributor Best fast food in all of Alexandria. The Owners Lance&Amanda are incredible. The have Special Events like"Bingo"for Seniors and all kind ... More

Contributor I don't know what blend you use but i have never tasted coffee like community in my life. It has absolutely no bitter after taste unlike most ... More

Dorothy and Amy were godsends. They also did the catering which turned out beautifully. They took every idea that I had and ... More
Map Details Add to Trip Reviews (2) 25. Texas Roadhouse Alexandria, LA AVERAGE USER RATING (2) A Yahoo! Contributor Awesome food! Fun atmosphere! It usually takes a while to get in but it is DEFINITLEY worth the wait!
